record.description: Any soldier or sailor stationed on the south side who is handy with an iron need not go with un-pressed trousers. Equipment is provided at the Midway U.S.O center, 975 E. 60th Street, donated by the Mother's Aid of the Chicago Lying-In Hospital. The three second class seamen using the ironing board are : left to right, Meredith Hobson, Edwin Ketcham, and Alfonse Morrison, who are stationed at the University of Chicago.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
